alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tooele County through 545 PM MDT... At 512 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tooele Army Depot, or 9 miles southwest of Tooele, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Tooele Army Depot, Stockton, Rush Valley and Erda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
